sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>samurai</radical> with a <radical>jackhammer</radical>, and <radical>wolverine</radical> carrying <radical>water</radical>?! All these things tell you that they're not just working, but have been made a <kanji>slave</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Traditionally, samurai don't work with jackhammers, and wolverine definitely wasn't made to carry water. The samurai and wolverine are doing these tasks for someone else, meaning they're somebody's slave.
readingMnemonic: You don't like seeing <kanji>slave</kanji>s. As you walk by, you hand them a <reading>ray</reading> (<ja>れい</ja>) gun so they can free themselves.
readingInfo: The samurai and wolverine can use the ray gun to shoot their keeper and get away. Imagine watching them holding up their master and getting away. A ray gun is a truly powerful weapon in the hands of a slave.
